description:
As Mikado confronts Sensei, his birth father, he learns that Sensei is a killer and hates Mikado himself enough to want to kill him. Despair threatens to make Mikado`s powers run wild.
To keep Mikado from going berserk, Erika borrows Hanzawa`s power and creates a path to the space that holds Mikado and Sensei.
At the same time, in order to save Hiyakawa, Mukae continues to speak with the young Hiyakawa who has fled into a space Sensei has created.
Source: crunchyroll
